name: Pigs (nathmaaas)
description:
Welcome to Pig Land! In this game you can play as a pig, walk around, hang out with pigs and become a literal airplane!

CONTROLS

W, A, S and D to move around

Escape to exit the current area and return to the hub

IN THE FLIGHT SIMULATION

TAB to switch airplanes (would recommend to stay with the pig plane)

Thanks for playing!
